doc.field: final, that could shift 0ur timing isa final, that could shift 0ur timing is a little bit. scientists have warned that extreme weather caused by global warming, could kill 150000 people in europe every year, by the end of the century. the findings come as parts of the continent endure recording breaking temperatures, with a severe heatwave sweeping across parts of italy, spain and the balkans, causing drought and forest fires.
